title: 地皮权限问题  我不知道给了个什么权限为什么所有人都能打开地皮的箱子啊
author: 让基佬发芽
txt_content:
有知道怎么解决的么？？？？
或者一个权限

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mango2017 于 2019-5-19 20:20 编辑 
f3184076159 发表于 2019-5-19 20:15
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups




image.png (31.9 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-5-19 20:18 上传






这俩删了

- plots.admin.command.deny
- plots.admin.interact.other

replies.author: 让基佬发芽
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 f3184076159 于 2019-5-19 19:54 编辑 

就是无视权限了啊!
什么权限都有就跟管理一样

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mango2017 于 2019-5-19 19:58 编辑 

你是不是添加了plotme.admin权限，去掉就可以了

你可以去plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world   查看groups.yml文件
看看用户权限组内，有没有包含admin的权限，有的话就去掉

replies.author: 让基佬发芽
replies.txt_content:
mango2017 发表于 2019-5-19 19:56
你是不是添加了plotme.admin权限，去掉就可以了

你可以去plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world   查看groups ...
把那一段删掉？  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content:
f3184076159 发表于 2019-5-19 20:00
把那一段删掉？  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:复制代码看Builder用户组里面   permissions下面有没有带admin的，或者你给我发一份你的那个文件

replies.author: 让基佬发芽
replies.txt_content:
mango2017 发表于 2019-5-19 20:06
看Builder用户组里面   permissions下面有没有带admin的，或者你给我发一份你的那个文件
 ...
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - '#'
    - chestcommands.open.ch.yml
    - chestcommands.open.dt.yml
    - chestcommands.open.mcd.yml
    - colorchat.toggle
    - EasyKits.cmd.*
    - EasyKits.kits.
    - EasyKits.kits.*
    - plots.admin.command.deny
    - plots.admin.interact.other
    - plots.permpack.basic
    - plots.permpack.basicflags
    - plots.permpack.basicinbox
    - plots.plot.1
    - plots.use
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: '&a&l[玩家]'
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''
